overview: The very near future. The interface between mind and machine has been perfected. Nano sensors and transmitters find and attach to neurons, this is the Neural Lace. Everyone is Laced. Invisible technology maps each person's neurons and connects them to everyone else. This has led to an internet of minds called THE MOMENT. A perfect distributed network.
tagline: In a war that takes place in peoples minds, how do you rebel when your thoughts are monitored?
title: The Moment
